price: Hoy se cumple la amenaza que Nuestro Señor nos hizo, y sufriremos el castigo [por nuestra incredulidad].
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
